description:
You can enable it using hotkey `CTRL+T` or using the menu `Tools -> DarkTheme`.
The plugin allows you to create your own theme.

[Announcement](https://sourceforge.net/p/keepass/discussion/329220/thread/fcd9700f30/)
summary: Plugin changes the appearance of KeePass, to make it look better at night
author: Krzysztof Łaputa
